燍燍燍

燍字的基本解释

燍
sī
烧焦的气味。

燍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sī］
［《廣韻》息移切，平支，心。］
焦臭味。
[②]［xī］
［《集韻》先齊切，平齊，心。］
见“烴燍”。

燍字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　燍； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页683第01
【廣韻】息移切【集韻】相支切，?音斯。【玉篇】焦氣也。【廣韻】火焦臭也。【集韻】烴也。　又【集韻】先齊切，音西。烴燍，焦貌。　又銑挺切，音醒。焦也。

燍字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
燍字的起名意思

暂无。

燍
Basic explanation of words
燍
sī
Burning smell.
燍
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sī]
["Guangyun" interest shift and cut, flat support, heart. ]
Burnt smell.
[②]［xī］
["Ji Yun" first cut, even, heart. ]
See "Hydrocarbon".
燍
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　燍; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 683 No. 01
[Guang Yun] interest, shift and cut [Ji Yun] phase branch and cut,? Yinsi. [Jade articles] Jiao Qi is also. [Guang Yun] The fire is burnt and smelly. 【Ji Yun】Hydrocarbon also.　[Jiyun] First Qiqie, the sound west. Hydrocarbon sallow, coke appearance.　It's milled again and it's cut, and the sound is awake. Jiao also.
燍
